sentences.en: Bracken fern has been spreading from its woodland strongholds for centuries, but the rate of encroachment into open countryside has lately increased alarmingly throughout northern and western Britain.
sentences.cn: 蕨类植物已经从它的林地据点向外蔓延了几个世纪，但是最近在整个英国北部和西部，蕨类植物侵入开阔乡村的速度却惊人地增长。

sentences.en: It's a sign of the encroachment of commercialism in medicine.
sentences.cn: 这是营利主义入侵医学界的一种迹象。

sentences.en: "We still need to control the encroachment of other development," he said.
sentences.cn: “我们需要控制各种开发活动的侵入，”他说。
